data.text: I highly recommend this spot if you are looking for a fabulous place to watch the sunset while sipping a fabulous cocktail and eating delicious food. We had a fabulous evening with friends out on the patio, which has a beautiful view, comfortable seating, and refreshing cooling. The staff are attentive and friendly and the overall feel of the hotel is calming and welcoming.
data.title: Perfect sunset!

data.text:
Great location and great service. Front desk staff were extremely helpful, especially Rabih who went the extra mile to make our stay memorable by assigning us a creek view room with fantastic sunset views
In addition to that the staff at the restaurants were also great and welcomed us and the dog with great care.
data.title: Great location and great service

data.text: Vidaâ€™s Creek Harbour exceeded my expectations in every way. The hotel's location offers stunning views of Dubai Creek Harbor, and its modern, well-appointed rooms provide the perfect retreat after a day of exploration. The staff's hospitality was exceptional, always going above and beyond to ensure a memorable stay. With delicious dining options, fantastic facilities, and a tranquil ambiance, Vida Creek Harbour offers excellent value for a luxurious Dubai experience. Highly recommended
data.title: Indulgent Dining and Tranquil Luxury

data.text:
5th stay here

Things have improved since last time, significantly. Pleased about that.

Very happy with the service, superb room service from Salman Khan each day, friendly and thorough. Thanks to him.

Back in May/June.

Really do recommend Creek Harbour as a base in Dubai , less hectic than most other communities yet easy to reach.
data.title: Much better
